name: Experiment 1: Chemical Reaction
description: Study of chemical reactions and properties.

name: Experiment 2: Physics Simulation
description: Simulation of various physics phenomena and detailed analysis of physical systems over a long duration.

name: Experiment 3: Biology Study
description: Observation and study of biological organisms.

name: Experiment 4: Quantum Mechanics
description: Exploration of quantum mechanical systems, including their probabilistic behavior and experimental verifications.

name: Experiment 5: AI Model Training
description: Training of machine learning models using different datasets and optimization techniques.

name: Experiment 6: Robotics Programming
description: Programming and controlling robots using modern techniques and algorithms for motion planning and manipulation.
